name: VR Xtream Racer Neon
description:
Check out Virtual Reality Xtream Racer Neon new 3D racing game.

Xtream Racer Neon is a high-speed 3D racing game infinite game.

Stunning high definition graphics with mindblowing gameplay giving you the adrenaline rush with every game.
We are here with One of the most exciting and addictive racing game And the best part of this game is that it is based on one of the best technology of this tech era- Virtual Reality.

It is a endless driving game with lots of twists and turns.

Game Features:

- High Definiton 3D Graphics.
 - Infinite endless runner game.
 - No in app purchase.

Xtream Racer Neon is a fun, addetive,interesting running game.
There are a lot of challenge and the nice 3D environment. 

- swipe left and right for play the game 
- very easy to controls swipe left and right
 - Get obstacles and earn points
 - Go as far as possible and collect coins to beat your friend.
 - Nice graphics and sounds
 - Addictive scenario 
- Easy to controls
 - Unlimited free game play
 - Endlessly challenging and fun game
